content: **crocheted cloths in drops safran piece is crocheted back and forth with horizontal lines with half treble crochets theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #winterforestwashcloths drops design pattern e-406 yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** 1 cloth measures approx 20 x 20 cm **yarn** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 65 pistachio / 60 moss green / 78 forest green / 22 almond / 68 coffee 1 cloth weighs approx 32 g **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 2 5 mm **crochet gauge** 28 half treble crochets in width on hook size 2 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized hook or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized hook
